title: TDR in lieu of cost of construction of built up amenity to be handed over as per the provisions of Regulation number 17(1) note 1(d) for Regulation 14, 15 & 17 shall be permissible within permissible BUA or owner may avail the TDR thereof if not consumed on the remainder land as per these Regulations
clause_text: TDR in lieu of cost of construction of built up amenity to be handed over as per the provisions of Regulation number 17(1) note 1(d) for Regulation 14, 15 & 17 shall be permissible within permissible BUA or owner may avail the TDR thereof if not consumed on the remainder land as per these Regulations.
section: Floor Space Indices in Residential, Commercial and Industrial Zones
